Description.Text: A location in the business district and near a variety of local attractions and shopping malls make the Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Sisli an ideal choice for a stay in the city. Boasting 217 spacious rooms and suites, this hotel in Istanbul provides convenient amenities like Free high-speed, wireless Internet access, individual climate control and complimentary access to the fitness centre and pool. Many of the rooms also feature breathtaking views of the city and Sisli Mosque. Guests can experience authentic Turkish cuisine at the on-site Hamdi Restaurant or grab a quick bite throughout the day at the Istan'bull. The Lobby Bar and Pool Bar are perfect places for an after-work cocktail or nightcap. The new Botanica Spa & Wellness Centre, opening in January 2014, will offer a fitness centre, Turkish hammam, sauna, steam bath, indoor and outdoor pools, and massage rooms. The hotel?s 16 flexible meeting facilities and 750-square-metre ballroom are well suited for conferences, galas and corporate events.

The hotel is located in the heart of Sisli district with quick access to a variety of nearby attractions and an array of travel options, travellers will have no problem traversing bustling Istanbul. Bus and metro stations are within a five-minute walk of the hotel. The hotel?s location in the business district provides a close proximity to multinational and local companies. The bus stop is the front of the hotel, while the subway station is within walking distance. The hotel also offers its own taxi service.

The Standard Rooms at the Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Sisli offer guests a privileged experience. Complimentary amenities include high-speed, wireless Internet access, in-room coffee and tea making facilities, bottled water and entrance to the Botanica Spa Wellness and Beauty Centre.
This is a modern apartment building.
Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served at this property.
This hotel has a big lobby.
